scrape(internal_only: bool = True, blacklist: List[str] | None = None, recursive=False) → None¶

Start the scraping process.

Parameters:

  • internal_only – Whether to only process internal URLs (i.e. ignore references to websites of other domains)

  • blacklist – List of domains to exclude (only used if internal_only is False)
